Text:
If not for the skull and crossbones I would think this was malware.

Can you tell us what the final version number is with this?

Thanks in advance.
do we need this if we have already installed Captain Scarlett?

(Forgive me if this looks like I am ignoring you, the comments ticker shows two comments, but I only see one.)

If found the answer to my question. The changelog reads as follows:
Borderlands 2 Update 5 info:

Borderlands 2 Update 1.1.2

- Prevents data instability when launched with unsupported commands.
i think this is just the patch which is already included in the DLC, for those who don't want Captain Scarlett DLC installed

@63Jax
It is less than 100MB. I would just use it anyway to be sure everything works as it should.
